sources.title: Action In The Atlantic BOGART 1943
sources.description: Humphrey Bogart plays a 1st Mate onÂ  WW2 Victory ship in an allied convoy hunted by murdering nazi U-Boats and their cowardly Captains.

metadata.Plot: Lieutenant Joe Rossi is 1st Officer on a Liberty Ship in a great convoy bound from Halifax to Murmansk. After German subs crushed the convoy, his ship loses the convoy and is heading alone to Murmansk. In spite of attacks by German planes and subs, he get the ship to Murmansk.
metadata.Director: Lloyd Bacon, Byron Haskin, Raoul Walsh
metadata.Writer: John Howard Lawson, Guy Gilpatric, A.I. Bezzerides
metadata.Actors: Humphrey Bogart, Raymond Massey, Alan Hale
metadata.Language: English, German, Russian, Norwegian, French, Spanish, Dutch
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 1 win & 1 nomination total
